Interface IControllerElementMappingsStore

Provides a store for IControllerElementMappings.

Namespace: Snowflake.Input.Controller.Mapped
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface IControllerElementMappingsStore

Methods

AddMappings(IControllerElementMappings, String)

Add the given mappings under the given profile name. Profile names do not have to be unique across mappings between different spec controllers and real devices, but must be unique for the same controller ID and device ID.

Declaration
void AddMappings(IControllerElementMappings mappings, string profileName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IControllerElementMappings mappings

The IControllerElementMappings to store.
System.String profileName

The profile name to store the mappings under.

AddMappingsAsync(IControllerElementMappings, String)

Asynchronously add the given mappings under the given profile name. Profile names do not have to be unique across mappings between different spec controllers and real devices, but must be unique for the same controller ID and device ID.

Declaration
Task AddMappingsAsync(IControllerElementMappings mappings, string profileName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IControllerElementMappings mappings

The IControllerElementMappings to store.
System.String profileName

The profile name to store the mappings under.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

DeleteMappings(ControllerId, InputDriverType, String, Int32, String)

Deletes the mapping profile from the provided controller ID to device ID.

Declaration
void DeleteMappings(ControllerId controllerId, InputDriverType driverType, string deviceName, int vendorId, string profileName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ControllerId controllerId

The Stone controller ID that maps to the real device.
InputDriverType driverType

The driver for which the mapping is for.
System.String deviceName

The name of the device.
System.Int32 vendorId

The vendor ID of the device.
System.String profileName

The name of the mapping profile.

DeleteMappings(ControllerId, String, Int32)

Deletes all mappings from the provided controller ID to device.

Declaration
void DeleteMappings(ControllerId controllerId, string deviceName, int vendorId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ControllerId controllerId

The Stone controller ID that maps to the real device.
System.String deviceName

The name of the device to delete mappings.
System.Int32 vendorId

The vendor ID of the device.
